languages.text: [Смиренно ждать] "Укрепи свою веру, сестра. Ибо лишь через смирение приходит истинная мудрость".

traits.locale_text: [Смиренно ждать] "Укрепи свою веру, сестра. Ибо лишь через смирение приходит истинная мудрость".

languages.text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."
languages.original_text: [Смиренно ждать] "Укрепи свою веру, сестра. Ибо лишь через смирение приходит истинная мудрость".

traits.locale_text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."
[Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."
[Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."
[Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."

languages.text: [耐心等待]“要恪守信念，姐妹。只有保持耐心与谦卑，才能得到真正的智慧。”
languages.original_text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."

traits.locale_text: [耐心等待]“要恪守信念，姐妹。只有保持耐心与谦卑，才能得到真正的智慧。”

languages.text: [Esperar con paciencia] «Refúgiese en la fe, hermana, pues solo a través de la paciencia y la humildad se alcanza la sabiduría».
languages.original_text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."

traits.locale_text: [Esperar con paciencia] «Refúgiese en la fe, hermana, pues solo a través de la paciencia y la humildad se alcanza la sabiduría».

languages.text: [辛抱強く待つ]「いいか、その信念は捨てろ。忍耐と謙虚さだけが真の知性に至る道とのことだ」
languages.original_text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."

traits.locale_text: [辛抱強く待つ]「いいか、その信念は捨てろ。忍耐と謙虚さだけが真の知性に至る道とのことだ」

languages.text: [Prendre votre mal en patience] « Armez-vous de courage et gardez la foi, ma sœur. Persévérance et humilité sont la seule et unique voie menant à la vraie sagesse. »
languages.original_text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."

traits.locale_text: [Prendre votre mal en patience] « Armez-vous de courage et gardez la foi, ma sœur. Persévérance et humilité sont la seule et unique voie menant à la vraie sagesse. »

languages.text: [Geduldig warten] "Stützt Euch auf Euren Glauben, Schwester. Denn nur durch Geduld und Demut erwächst wahre Weisheit."
languages.original_text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."

traits.locale_text: [Geduldig warten] "Stützt Euch auf Euren Glauben, Schwester. Denn nur durch Geduld und Demut erwächst wahre Weisheit."

languages.text: [Sabırla bekle] "İnancını yitirmeyesin. Gerçek bilgelik, sadece sabır ve tevazuyla kazanılır."
languages.original_text: [Wait patiently] "Gird your faith, sister. For it is only through patience and humility that true wisdom comes."

traits.locale_text: [Sabırla bekle] "İnancını yitirmeyesin. Gerçek bilgelik, sadece sabır ve tevazuyla kazanılır."
